column4: Quick question - What's a good VNC server to install that barely needs configuration after an installation? What is the state of NX?
depends on what you are going to do with it. I tend to use vnc4server. and just have the users make their own customized .vnc/xstartup as they want.
do you want to share the 'currently' running desktop. or have a 'hidden/background' desktop running - is a big question
